EmailTemplate.name: SWBR-202309-EMP-HCT-SHRM-WEBINAR.02 Post-Event (Get all the 2023 Virtual Care Tr
EmailTemplate.subject: Get all the 2023 Virtual Care Transformation Index results
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Insights from the 2023 Virtual Care Transformation Index Our recent webinar featured Dr. Alexander Alonso, SHRM Chief Knowledge Officer, and Kelly Bliss, President of U.S. Group Health at Teladoc Health, discussing the findings of the 2023 Virtual Care Transformation Index, in which we gained exciting new insights about the future of virtual care. Now, you can access all the results by downloading the full ebook. Get strategies to address challenging market trends like the persistent mental health crisis Build high-value benefits strategies that attract and retain talent Learn new ways virtual and digital health help decrease health inequity About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
